tool_description: Extracts comprehensive usage statistics from knowledge base systems, including article views, search queries, user sessions, and interaction metrics within specified time ranges.

start_date.description: Start date for data extraction in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for data extraction in ISO 8601 format

include_search_data.description: Whether to include search query data in extraction

error_messages: Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps
Date range too large: Maximum allowed range is 2 years
No data available: No usage data found for the specified time period
usage: Specify start_date and end_date to define the analysis period. Optionally disable search data inclusion. Returns detailed usage metrics for further analysis.

total_sessions.description: Total number of user sessions in the period

article_views.description: List of article IDs with their view counts

unique_users.description: Number of unique users accessing the knowledge base
